title.rendered: “Latest IDF Casualty Updates: Injuries and Fallen Soldiers in Gaza Strip Battles”

content.rendered:
Attached is a message from IDF spokesperson concerning the name of an IDF casualty which has been informed to his family: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC10122023541112

Attached is a link to the IDF website, where the details and pictures of the fallen soldiers are published and updated: https://www.idf.il/59780

In addition, an officer from the 50th Battalion, Nahal Brigade, was severely injured in a battle in the north of the Gaza Strip. A reserve soldier from the 9215th Battalion, ‘Iron Fist’ Brigade (205), was severely injured in a battle in the center of the Gaza Strip.

Similarly, a soldier from the Nahal reconnaissance unit was severely injured in a battle in the north of the Gaza Strip. A reserve officer from the 271st Engineering Battalion, ‘Spearhead’ Brigade (55), was severely injured in a battle in the south of the Gaza Strip. Moreover, a reserve soldier from the 271st Engineering Battalion, ‘Spearhead’ Brigade (55), was severely injured in a battle in the south of the Gaza Strip.
